climbs.name: The Whistleblower
climbs.fa: Michelle Locatelli/ Richard and Lisa Harrison

content.description: Climb up cream colored face on edges, slopes, and sidepulls. Crux area about 3/4s of the way up route. Up last small headwall to anchors.
content.location: This is the middle bolted route on the cliff.

climbs.name: Pandas Aren't Bears
climbs.fa: Michelle Locatelli/ Richard and Lisa Harrison

content.description: Starts up dark colored overhanging rock, then trends right onto red and cream colored, sandy face(crux area). Probably best to preclip first bolt with stick or by using back wall for stance.
content.location: This is highest up route in gully, on the left edge of the cliff face.

climbs.name: P.A.L.s
climbs.fa: Michelle Locatelli/ Richard and Lisa Harrison

content.location: 4th route down from top of cliff. To right of The Whistleblower.

content.description: Climb past first bolt to low-angle face with cracks.Route may be supplemented with gear at this point or run it out to next bolt. Wall steepens at this point, up and a move to the left(crux area) and then on up to anchors.
content.location: This the second bolted route down gully from the top. On obvious cream colored steep face.

climbs.name: Gettin' Mavericky
climbs.fa: Michelle Locatelli/ Richard and Lisa Harrison

content.description: Fun climbing up cream colored lower-angled rock on edges and slopey holds.
content.location: First route you get to on approach to cliff.The right side of the wall.

content.description: Secluded small wall that gets morning sun/afternoon shade.Routes range from low-angle to steep.
